title: Ramayana__The_Legend_Of_Prince_Rama_(2025)_Hindi_Movie_1080p_Web-DL.mp4
description:
Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama is an animated film originally released in 1993, created through a collaboration between India and Japan. Directed by Yugo Sako, the movie is based on the ancient Indian epic, the Ramayana. It tells the tale of Prince Rama, his devotion, and his battles to rescue his wife Sita from the demon king Ravana.

In 2025, the film was re-released in 4K remastered version across theaters in India. It is now available in multiple languages, including Hindi, English, Tamil, and Telugu.

The movie has been celebrated for its beautiful animation and faithful representation of one of India's greatest epics.
